did.abstract: Member of Medical Corps, 310th Engineers, U.S. Army who served in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition." Collection includes letter and songs relating to the Polar Bear expedition to Archangel.

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by the Polar Bear Association in 1964 (Donor no.: 4145).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
